function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Comparative study of virus behavior on different surfaces","Impact":"Misunderstanding of virus behavior may lead to ineffective sanitation practices","Mitigation":"Provide clear guidelines for surface disinfection based on virus behavior","Technologies":"Surface testing for virus presence, data analysis tools","People":"Public, sanitation workers, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Public health agencies, research institutions"},{"Description":"High viral load and asymptomatic carriers","Impact":"Increased risk of widespread transmission due to undetected carriers","Mitigation":"Regular testing, contact tracing, public health education","Technologies":"Diagnostic testing, contact tracing apps, public health campaigns","People":"General public, healthcare professionals, public health agencies","Owner":"Public health agencies, governments"},{"Description":"Efficacy of disinfectants","Impact":"Ineffective disinfectants may lead to persistence of viruses on surfaces","Mitigation":"Use of approved hospital-grade disinfectants, clear guidelines on disinfectant use","Technologies":"Approved disinfectants, disinfectant testing, guidelines and protocols","People":"Sanitation workers, healthcare professionals, public","Owner":"Public health agencies, cleaning product manufacturers"}]}
